content.detailedDescription: This happened the summer before i started nursing school. my husband and i went for a ride in the country with a friend of ours.  our friend had beer with him, but my husband and i did not drink. we were riding in a pick up truck on country roads and were some where south of glennwood iowa. we had decided to head home and turned to the west down a gravel road. the gravel road jogged to the left and then to the right as it came down a bluff. i remember thinking that the farmer must have payed the county to go around his field. as we came down the road we commented that there was a pulsating. the pulsations were not like a sound but more like a feeling. the closest i can explain it is like if you are around high tension wires, wompa, wompa. right after we noticed the pulsation we noticed to the right a white light just at the top of the hill. at the bottom of the hill the road again jogged to the right and we were now at the bottom of the bluff and we could clearly see an object hovering at tree top level across the field to our right. we stopped the truck. i was sitting in the middle. i remember our friend got out of the truck on the passenger car. i remember being scared and got out of the car on the drivers side. i remember that it was dark but you could make out the shape which was typical ufo saucer shape. it had white light  emanating from inside the object. they actually appeared to be window like. i started to walk around the truck closer to it when it slowly began to ascend hovered for a second then shot straight up and was gone. we were pretty freaked out about it and i remember turning the radio on to see if there were any reports. after that we never talked about it again. i was talking with a student of mine years later in the 1990's somehow the subject of ufo's came up. he was talking about his experience and it sounded eerily like mine. even the feeling of wompa, wompa. except his experience was in his house with the object just over their trees to the south west. several years later the student who was now a friend  had me drive in the country to see if i could find the road. when i found a road that seemed the same as we got to the bottom and i said i pretty sure this is the road he told me that just over the top of the hill behind the trees was the house he lived in as a child. that was the house he had the ufo experience in.
content.summary: Sighted an object having just above trees

content.detailedDescription: Driving to the store it was dusk and my daughter asked me what the orange ball was.  i dismissed it as an airplane until i saw it with two others.  i stopped to see if i could hear any noise.  they disappeared behind the trees.  then three more came.  i was watching from outside my van parked on the side of the road.  i then proceed to drive to the store when one more came along by itself.  i saw it early so i stopped and watched it on the same path as the other six. we live in a rural area.  my daughter was afraid because i stopped. i felt no threat.  i flew commercially for 10 years and could not identify these flying objects as aircraft.  i thought they could be some weird candle driven balloon but they moved too fast and the first three were flying in formation of a triangle. same as the next three. they were low enough that i could see the clouds behind them.  i have no explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: Flying orbs southwest to northeast

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard which is in the water and faces downtown miami. it's was a clear night with scattered clouds and a quarter moon. i noticed a transparent object with a jelly fish like type movement. it also had a beam of light. there were also 7 other people with me. it was real close when i noticed it and then it moved in the distance looked like wings. then it moved through the clouds and had a small light beam. it disappeared into the night after around 7 minutes.
content.summary: Looked like jelly fish movement then it was like a transparent wing like object moving with the clouds and had a little beam of light was real close then it went far

content.detailedDescription:
As my friend was on my balcony smoking a cigarette (because smoking is not allowed in my apartment) he called me out to see what he called "an annunaki space ship" so i came out to the balcony just in time to see a star like object moving in a southbound direction suddenly stop moving and start hovering.

i told my friend i needed to get my glasses so  that i could better see the object. so i returned to my living room to collect my eyeglasses. when i returned to the balcony wearing my glasses the object had disappeared into the clouds. when i asked my friend where it had gone he replied that it had ascended vertically.

this sighting was not identifiable in my opinion but was identified by my friend to be an annunaki vehicle. my friend has been promising me that he has been visiting with the annunaki and travelling to their home world many times since he was eleven years old.

psychiatrists have declared this man's ramblings to be delusional because this person has a mental illness. however, the same person has referred me to two other persons who are connected with an annunaki star people's landing site in the province of quebec, canaada.

i was not surprised to see a moving light in the sky because this was  not the first time i have witnessed moving star-like objects in the nightime.

i will prepare a more complete report of all the times i have witnessed what might be called ufos.

one of the other persons revealed to me by this friend has a website on which he describes a long standing history of annunaki visitors at the quebec landing site.

my friend has answered many questions about the star people. he declares that there are three different types of alien visitors; namely: the greys, the annunaki, and the reptilian. he also claims that the annunaki are the most advanced and are willing to share technology in return for certain natural and supernatural resources.

the person who has posted the website has publicly declared that his name and the website are accessible to anyone free from monetary charges or any other obligations.

i am a systems design engineer who has embarked up[on a quest to build a factory to mass manufacture a fleet of faster than light speed space craft that will be used as disaster relief transportation on both of our planets.

my friend has recently backed up my preliminary design work on this project. due to a lack of finances, i have had to stop working on the project because the software i need costs money and i am living on a fixed income without any success in my efforts to raise any working capital.

my friend and i have watched the mufon hangar 1 show many times. he has declared the triangular ships to be annunaki war vessels. a psychiatrist has convinced authorities to issue an order against my having any further contact with this co-witness. but i do have permission to visit the annunaki landing site with the person who has posted the website.

i have a diagnosis of schizophrenia, however, i do not think this fact diminishes the quality of my reporting my experiences. my understanding of the true nature of my illness and my success in augmenting the minimal drug therapy prescribed by the doctors allows me to have a cohesive command of the english language, and the ability to be accurate in the details of my report.

i have a self generated internet presence as well and i am fearless to go public with my experiences relating to all my knowledge about the  lights that appear to be moving in the sky, and about my scientific contributions to high technology.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This sighting was initiated by a friend who claims multiple contacts with annunaki.Visitors

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of saturday 9/19/2015 i was working on a cabin on the lake shore of diamond lake . at around 830 am . i looked up at see a large passenger jet pass over , thinking it looked cool at this high altitude , the lake is around 5000 feet elevation. as the jet passed over head it appeared to pass what looked like at first glance was a large bright star , only this is day time and its not a star . a co worker and i observed the object for five or six hours , until i had to leave the jobsite to go to my other job as a security guard. during those hours we looked at object through binoculars and could see the object much clearer. the object seemed to be hovering but was tumbling and spinning in one spot , you could clearlie see the sun reflect off of the shinny metallic surface.And lights red , blue white , yellow and a few different shades between . we kept watching the object as we worked , not getting much done because of what we where seeing . i eventually had to leave for my other job. i stopped a few times as i was leaving so i could spot it agine , and did . took a few pictures with my phone but it is cheap and i don't think i got any that would show up , because i could not see it through my viewfinder. i did take a few pictures and a short video that i have not looked at yet but is on my phone . i have not had a chance to download the stuff yet because i just got home and began to do this report while it is still fresh as possible in my memorie.
content.summary: Looked up to see a passenger jet and spotted a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Saw 2 objects travelling from s to n , have seen hundreds of jets/airplanes from my deck, was on the phone and told my girlfriend that i was watching some ufo's - took some pics while talking to her. no contrail and velocity was a little abnormal from what i usually see( and 99% of all flights are e to w or w to e)
   so , i am just curious if it was a couple jets, or something else in the area. 
  to include the narrative points- i always look towards the sky.  it was a clear , beautiful day and these 2 objects stood out to me immediately because of their direction and the speed of one of them. i watched them as long as i could until they were out of sight. 
   
  i attached some pics-- you can actually see both objects in a couple . 
  i also have a pic of a jet about 45 minutes later showing a contrail and also a pic of the moon for contrast.
content.summary: Orb/star like object

content.detailedDescription:
1.)was in car pulling into driveway. 
2.) looked over to nearby house noticed the object hovering above the house. 
3.)wasn't sure what the object was.
4.)object was hovering short distance above the house, object had bright green lights distanced equally across the side of the object, object disappeared suddenly before i could observe anything else.
5.) didn't really feel any particular emotion in regards to the object, immediately asked others in the car if they noticed the object.
6.) object suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: Wide, short, object hovering above nearby house

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 2 friends were sitting in the front yard watching the cars go by and i noticed bright light coming over the hill and i said whats that it got closer and i took photos with my iphone and a vedeo zoomed in and it looked like a meteor but things were coming out of flying up and down side to side and it came back the next morning about same time each time it showed up it was there until sun came up
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Suddenly appeared from the south from the city of jacson came on the 18 and again on the 19

content.detailedDescription:
at 7:20 pm central standard time i saw a red globe appear in the sky. i was siting on my porch facing north west, and a red orb
appeared out of nowhere and moved across the sky then stopped and hovered. it almost seemed like it had been sitting there and someone decided to turn on the lights! it hovered or sat in the same spot 
for around 30 seconds, after which time it blinked out again. i ran in the house and called my husband to get the camera and take video.
when i returned outside to see if i could view it again, there appeared what looked like plane lights, at least three of them, flying
in and around the area where the red orb appeared.
 several minutes later, my son and grand daughter came driving up for a visit and i had just told them all what i had witnessed, when
the light show began again! the red orb appeared again in the same general area, but this time to the left of where it first appeared.
it again hovered in the air with the same plane type smaller lights flashing blue, red, and white around it. my husband was trying to 
film it but the camera battery was dead. the orb again disappeared but the smaller lights stayed flying around the area. the larger
orb appeared once again, this time to the right of it's original first sighting. my husband witnessed it twice and son witnessed it three times. i witnessed it four.
 we have watched the news for any kind of answer to this sighting, but nothing. no comets', no explosions, zip! i didn't know who to 
contact, so googled lights in the sky over central part of the state, and came upon this sight. my son was completely mind boggled and upset, and didn't want to speak of it with me,
but i am willing to talk with someone if needed. i've never in my life seen anything such as this and felt excitement and wonder to witness it!
 in conclusion, the large red orb would changed colors at times, with blue, green, and red, but mainly a orange/red color predominating.
the smaller lights looked as if they might be aircraft as they were much slower moving than the orb. they did however continuously
circle the area where the orb appeared, each time, in each distinct area. the whole experience lasted at least 20 minutes. again, the 
orb would blink on, stay on for several seconds, move a small amount in a given direction and then blink off, only to reappear in
a different section of the same general area, and blink out again. this is a clear night with no clouds and all the stars shining. the moon was out as well. we lost sight of the orb as it blinked off again and didn't show back up for at least 10 minutes more that we stood there watching.Also,
the smaller plane type lights continue to fly around as i write this message.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb appearing, disappearing, reappearing in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the georgia tech - notre dame football game inside when i decided to go out on my balcony to smoke a cigarette. about half way through my cigarette i felt compelled to look up in the sky and that is when, about 80 to 85 degrees above the horizon i saw a star like object hovering in the sky. it was very small, like a faint star. however, this in the afternoon just before 2:00pm. there were no clouds in the sky. the object seemed to be in the direction of santa monica, roughly to the north-west. it was very hard to discern, and if you looked away it was hard to find it again. however, once i saw it i felt compelled to not look away. i observed the object for about 10 minutes or so, and at almost exactly 2:00 the object simply vanished. there was no flash, no fading out, nothing. it simply vanished. i tried my hardest to look for the object, thinking that i might have just lost focus of it. it was very small and, like i mentioned before, if you looked away it was hard to locate again. however, it simply vanished. when i first saw the object i became very excited. i felt like it was looking at me. maybe that's why it vanished so quickly when i spotted it. just to be clear, i live near lax and i see aircraft flying over my apartment all the time. in fact, during my observation of the, a boeing 737 with southwest airlines livery flew over my apartment. the difference between the two objects appearance and behavior were obvious. after the sighting i immediately came inside to leave this report. i am unaware of what the object could be. this is the 3rd or 4th sighting of an object exactly like this one i have had this past year.
content.summary: Star like object hovered in daylight then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: Observed object in sky through my moon roof flying northeast then did abrupt directional change to due north.
content.summary: Observed while a passenger in a vehicle

content.detailedDescription: Case number 6923 this has been going on for 45 years
content.summary: Multiple time loss events  i would like someone to check my possible implants because dr. won't

content.detailedDescription:
Our sighting started on the night of september 17, 2015, and after it happened again on september 18, 2015, we decided to file this report. we were both in our master bed room watching tv, when a bright goldish/ greenish light appeared off in the distance from our upstairs bedroom window. since we live near the flight path of dulles airport, initially i dismissed it as an aircraft. my wife said that the craft started moving erratically, and not flashing in any real pattern like a plane would. if you take your fist and place them one on top of the other the craft were about 4 to 6 fist up in the air from the horizon, off to the west. the first night there was only one, and it moved very fast, not steady like a plane, or helicopter, the flashing colors were also not like a plane. the craft moved in a south west angle toward the prince william highway. the second night the 18th there were three craft this time, all flashing and moving very oddly. 

both night there were commercial aircraft in the sky as well, so we could contrast these objects against the commercial planes.
content.summary: For the past two nights my wife and i have witnessed a set of flashing erraticly moving crafts

content.detailedDescription:
Early in the morning on october 7, 2014, 7:15 a.M. i walked out into our fabrication yard in midland, texas. it was still dark, with sunrise about 25 minutes away, with a low cloud cover that morning. 
as i exited the building through one of the large bay doors facing due west when i had a strange feeling that said "look up". when i did what i saw was a dark, not specifically black, but a dark triangle object moving just under the clouds, just in the lower edge of the clouds, or the object was slightly transparent and the clouds could be seen through it. the objects corners were illuminated with a light that was a dim florescent, like what you see when you turn off a florescent bulb in a pitch black room. it moved very slowly,steady and silently, and it made no sound and left no trail.  oddly enough there was little sound from anything that morning at all. there we not flashing lights, no strobes, no projected light, no colored lights of any kind, just a faint luminescent glow.
(after the incident i mentally noted that there was little or no traffic noise and we are in an industrial side of town with lots of 7a.M. traffic)
the object was observed for 35 seconds as it moved in a nw direction. during the time i observed it, the object made two very quick pulses forward.  both of them occurred near the end of the 35 seconds observed. after the second pulse it held steady for a couple of second and then it turned directly north and when out of view behind our building. i ran to the other side but did not see the object again.
content.summary: Very slow, silent, corners glowed like a turned off floresent bulb, made two quick pulses forward and turned directly north.

content.detailedDescription:
First report


on september 16th, 2015, i was eating with my family in makansutra glutton's bay in esplanade mall, singapore. the table was facing the marina bay sands, and it was almost time for the light show. i saw an orange light below the second and third towers. i dismissed it as a plane. but then i saw  it: an arrowhead triangle object, pointing northeast if it were a compass. the orange was bigger than a star. two red lights were on the base. it was descending. it disappeared in a flash of light.



second report


two days after the first event, i was in the children's garden portion of gardens by the bay. while playing in the waterpark, i saw a scorpion-shaped object, red-burnt sienna on the claws, and gold on the body. it sometimes turned like a pendulum, visible from the left of a clock. at that point it was bird-shaped, and the wings became blue. it had a clearly defined outline. it hovered for 45 minutes.
content.summary: Two ufos in my vacation to singapore

content.detailedDescription: Letting dogs out at night clear sky's. i saw huge red orange light not meteor come up over tree line across street a little lower than normal flight levels no sound moving faster than i've seen. i'm ex military and current nyc detective never seen fighter or helicopter or commercial plane move this fast. it came toward me east then changed direction north bobbled a lot and straightens out going higher in front of a plane that was much slower. the plane changed course and followed it that's when the light seemed to just turn off. called my wife outside to tell her and within two minutes it came again starting about where it was when it first came above trees  but followed a different course no bobbling but seemed faster we videoed it but it's a little crappy was from cell phone wen to same area north and disappeared looked for a bit seemed to come back where we lost it but was hovering lost it again hard to see with ambient light and trees. i can send the video if this looks like something your interested in.
content.summary: Bright slightly pulsing huge red orange ball that changed direction no sound

content.detailedDescription: I witnesses this weird flying pbjexr ascending and descending from like 20k feet to like 40k feet to 10 k feet in less than a second.
content.summary: Object ascending and descending too fast for a human to endure

content.detailedDescription: I was sat outside having breakfast as it was sunny with a clear sky, i noticed an object which i initially assumed was an aircraft to the north about a mile away and approx. 3000 ft. i looked to see what it was being a bit of an aircraft nerd. it was very shiny like it was in unpainted aluminium and made absolutely no sound as it passed which was very unusual from my location in relation to it i would estimate length at approx. 40 ft and could not make out any discernible control surfaces fins, flaps, wings etc. it was travelling slow for an aircraft and passed from view within probably 45 seconds. i have flight radar app on my phone so checked that it was not showing only the fixed wing aircraft at high altitude flying to scotland was showing at my location which was also visable to me from where i was sat. approx 4 min later i heard a helicopter which came into view at approx. the same altitude and track as the earlier object except i was alerted to this before i saw it due to it having engine noise, it followed the same flight path as the object it was dark coloured from my prospective and similar to a lynx type helicopter although it was a little far to make an exact identification it also did not appear on the flight radar app.
content.summary: Silver object tracking north to south

content.detailedDescription: I awoke with whispers i was in a daze so i started to the bathroom and before i left my room i looked in my little brothers room and seen a light on outside witch was nothing so i looked to try to find my dogs and just then they started to whimper so i looked to see why and just as i looked my mom waked in and asked what i was doing i told her so she was interested in seeing what it was just then she said look at the bushes and just before i was going to look i looked in between the cars and i seen a small gray/ transparent person casting a shadow but no body so i kept my eyes on it and asked my mom to keep her eyes on what she saw and we did for 2 hours and 15 mins the sun started to come up so i asked her to go outside while i kept a eye on the shadow and just as she stepped we both saw nothing so with disappointment i ran outside to try and maybe see if anyone or anything was there and nothing but when we tried to leave her battery was dead and my car had a smell of copper and since that night i've been slowly going deaf but i've still been seeking and feeling different objects and beings
content.summary: Driving home after visiting family i first notice a rip in the sky about 5 miles long by 1 1/2 mile across estimate with 5 colors

content.detailedDescription:
My wife woke me up, and said she was hot, then very dry, her mouth, and her face felt sun burn. i looked out of bedroom window and it was about 200ft away and moving away, but could see it better, 2 x cotton reels with a ring of lights at the top and a ring of lights though the middle and ring of lights at the bottom. it stayed untill 6.15 in morning. it was now day light.
it went.
content.summary: 2 x cotton reels

content.detailedDescription: I was young no age or even time is remembered just that it was dark it was like the sun but it gave off a goldish light like non i have ever witnessed not even the sun it was across the street in my landlords yard not even 20 feet off the ground. since i was a young i just stared in interest not thinking about what it was just that it was beautiful. it stayed in the same position making no movements, soon after it started to slowly ascend up until it was out of view. i am the only known witness. no creatures of any type were seen. if this was even seen please notify me on facebook.
content.summary: Brief but "soul changing"

content.detailedDescription: I was with two friends we were driving the back roads, the "grey glowing being" walked in front of front of car and we all saw it . it just kept walking my one friend wanted to run after it but we begged him not to!  we were scared but he laughed . i almost started to cry when he attempted to open the door! the weird thing is neither of my friends r ember seeing it! it was ant 3-4 ft tall head was large with long arms . it walked fast but never even looked at us. it was dark and we were in woods but seen him walk for minute like he glowed. why don't my other friends remember seeing this alien?
content.summary: Seen an alien whaling in woods

content.detailedDescription: I went out into my back yard at night to smoke a cigarette. i sat down in my chair facing to the north. i noticed two lights vertical from eachother, stationary in the sky. at first, i thought they were stars, but being pretty familiar with my nights sky, i realized after staring at them for a minute that they were too big, pretty bright and werent any stars i was used to seeing, considering i'm in my backyard various times in the evening every night. once i realized they weren't stars or any type of satellite i had ever seen before, i reached down to grab a spotting scope next to me. as i looked back up after grabbing the spotting scope, one of the lights dimmed out and was gone. as i brought the spotting scope up to my eye to look at the other light, it dimmed out and disappeared as well. i looked through my spotting scope at the area where i seen the lights and could not see anything out of the ordinary in the area where they were. i have no pictures or videos of the event. it all happened pretty fast. i'm certain they weren't planes due to the fact that we are near the landing flight path of the local airport and see planes coming in for a landing a lot. i'm pretty certain they weren't satellites as i see, what i believe are satellites, quite often and even as satellites dim out as they are passing through the nights sky and move out of the light, i can still pick up my spotting scope and see them much longer through the scope than with the naked eye. i'm sorry that this is all of the information i have on these lights, but its certainly not the only strange things i've seen happen in the nights sky, almost certainly because we live close to beale air force base. thank you.
content.summary: Observed two bright lights vertical of each other. one dimmed out and the next shortly after.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from college of dupage on 9/17/2015. i was going down butterfield road, turned left onto naperville road and was approaching the intersection of naperville and east warrenville road when i noticed five bright red orbs in the horizon. my attention was immediately captured, for these bright red orb shapes did not look like anything i had ever seen before. they were in an upwards crescent, like an upside down rainbow shape, or a smiley face. the light turned red at the intersection, and i was able to get a longer look. it was then i realized that these lights were not the airplane guideline lights that blink red to warn the planes they are close to ground. these were way too bright and large to be such a thing. to my amazement i noticed that these lights were actually moving at a slow steady pace. they were glimmering, or almost appeared to be vibrating. i was so entranced with these mysterious lights that i couldn't resist but to follow them. i turned right onto east warrenville road and quickly turned left into the parking lot of kjww engineering. i had a clear view of the orbs flight pattern, for my spot allowed me to see all the clear sky above i-88 west. as soon as i slammed into park the three of the five orbs suddenly flashed away, leaving three lights remaining. the red lights turned to a bright white, and formed themselves into a triangular pattern. the remaining three slowed to the pace that i first observed them at. i watched the lights for a few minutes before deciding to leave in fear. i went on to i-88 west  and observed three of the orbs still making their flight along the horizon, two were flying one atop the other, with one a few feet in front of them. this did not look like any plane, for the lights were rather large and very very bright. i felt a combination of shock, fear and numbness after seeing the orbs, which disappeared from my view point as i drove down i-88. i passed the orbs as i went on in traffic.It is hard to put the feeling i felt when i saw the orbs into words, for it was one i have never experienced before. i think it is because in the 13 minutes i viewed the orbs i realized that we truly are not alone in this universe. and that, is a very very very humbling experience. the pictures were taken in the parking lot of kjww engineering at 1100 warrenville road, lisle il, an intersection a 300 feet down east warrenville road, and i-88 west. the ictures were taken from my droid mini smartphone. you will have to zoom in amongst the bottom the pictures to see the orbs in a triangular pattern.
content.summary: Five red orbs in upwards crescent observed, open getting closer three disappeared, leaving three orbs in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription: I recently reported a ufo incident from my childhood back in 1980...My 2nd sighting took place in september of 2012 i was at my parents home with my two sons a cousin and my brother we were shooting &  sighting in our bows for the 2012 michigan deer season.. i was taking a break from shooting.. smoking a cigarette sitting on the open door frame on my parents she'd door war hang the others shoot they're bows from east to the target to the west when something caught my eye on the horizon as i looked i seen a huge transparent triangle roll over... it was like it was invisible till it rolled over and the sunlight behind it exposed it's shape... and as it rolled over completely it was gone totally went back invisible as fast as it rolled over... it happened so fast i never thought about saying "hey guys look" nor would i have had the time..But it was a truly amazing feeling to think other worldly beings are hear undetected observing us... i know we're not alone in the universe... any one who believes we are.. is being very foolish... we are not the only life force.. we are one little spec in this massive universe.. with millions of other solar systems and planets hovering they're stars... we are all star children... when will the world wake up and realize our mission in life is to travel space in unity??... i feel blessed to have witnessed two for sure sightings... thanks for your time.
content.summary: Massive transparent triangle

content.detailedDescription: I'm a street photographer from new york at the moment i was driving down the highway with 3 friends to coney island to pick up my friends christopher's girlfriend . i always carry my camera with me at the time i shot with a fujifilm xt1 and had it i machine gun mode for rapid shots.We were passing by the bridge as i decided to just rapid fire some shots of the bridge free hand and i did not have my eye sight in my view finder. what caught my attention was a sudden string flash at the corner of my eye kind of like lightening but in the distance . at that moment i took my finger off the shutter and reviewed my photos from the rapid fire when j came across the object. unfortunately i did not back up my photos and the other 3 were lost when my mac book crashed a few days ago this is the only photo i have left. if u have friends that can restore lost data that be great so i can recover the other photos. the more i reviewed these photos the more i'm frightened so here i go submitting this photo. it's made a believer in me. the object moved at such speed that i only had in the frames for about mabe a second or 2  it's also moved from the front of the bridge to out of the frame in that small amount of time.
content.summary: I was just taking pictures

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my driveway to smoke a cig. it is a clear night and i like to look up for shooting stars. i generally see a few planes flying overhead, either into charlotte- douglas or jus passing by. i have seen emergency and military helicopters fly by before as well. this object caught my eye because of the green and red colors that were much brighter than anything i have seen before here. i have been here almost 3 years in the concord area. i have lived in myrtle beach for 15 years, and delaware for 24 years or so. at first i thought not much of it, but it was pretty, so i watched. then it stopped and hovered. maybe 2 miles away at a relatively low height. then it began to move forward slowly in the same direction it was going originally. after a second or two the forward motion went from slow to amazingly fast across about a quarter of the sky. i was intrigued. it had stopped and hovered again. no noise. it began another slow movement at about a 90 degree angle and almost immediately accelerated again in a very unnatural rate to a point almost over my head. still no noise. at this point, i was very curious. it then hovered again over my house and then headed generally east for a short time before stopping again. at this point, i went inside to tell my mother what i was seeing her and to bring her out to look at it. when she came out in about 30 seconds it was still hovering about 1000 feet above the woods behind our house. she saw it as well and was also confused by it. after about another 30 seconds of watching it slowly move around, it finally went from a hover to a very high speed to the north. lost sight of it then. my mom went inside and i stayed out for another hour without ever seeing it return. the entire time it was visible, commercial airplanes were criss crossing the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A pair of lights much brighter than than the usual airplane lights and also not the usual colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the front porch with my wife, it was near dusk and we had been watching for deer. we heard what sounded like a helicopter flying below the ridge line of the mountain behind us to from the south end to the north end. this concerned me because i could not see the helicopter but i could hear it and it was moving pretty quick and low. my wife went inside, i then walked out into the front yard and heard a roaring noise coming towards me from the west. i did not hear the sound until it was almost directly over me. it passed directly over my head at a speed i would guess to be around 3-5 mph. i was shocked by what i was seeing but i kept my head and never took my eyes off of it until it was gone, i will admit i was a little scared. the object had a green light in the front and blue and white lights in the rear. i would estimate it to have been about 100 feet long. the front was very narrow and grew in width with a wingspan i would guess was around 75 foot. i would not really call them wings, it is hard to describe but i could draw them. the object was gone as quick as it came and i lost sight as it continued to travel from west to east. the trees were bare and it just seemed to follow the treetops down the side of the mountain until i lost sight of it. after it was gone i was afraid i had seen something i shouldn't have. having had worked for a defense contractor i had a lot of exposure to military aircraft and i surely could not think of any planes that could fly that low and slow being as big as it was. i was afraid to say anything, i knew i had just seen something that changed my life, the way i thought about things and i even stopped going to church. i still have not told anyone what i saw including my wife and i probably never will. i think about this event almost everyday. i see military aircraft in my area a couple times a week but nothing like this object. at the time i held a government clearance and was afraid to say anything. i no longer hold any clearance and felt like i needed to get this off my chest.
content.summary: It seemed like it was being chased or searched for.

content.detailedDescription: Estaba mirando tele a la 14 horas cuando senti un sumbido sobre la casa y sali hacia la parte posterior del patio para fijarme que hera y mire hacia arriba y note a unos 70 metros de altura una esfera de color gris aluminio como metal fundido como aluminio llame ami esposa he hijo de para que observen el objeto se mantuvo estatico como 18 minutos el sumbido seso pero el objeto esferico cambio a un verde oxidado luego decendio unos metros tomoe el mismo color de antes y lentamente se alejo, dos dias despues pero de noche sobre mi casa estaba afuera mirando  para el cielo hera de noche y senti un sumbido pero no como el anterior miro hacia atras y a  unos 20metros  por encima, un objeto de forma triangular de unos 20 metros de esquina a esquina liso negro en cada punta una luz tenue, como fuego rojo como dentro de un cristal o vidrio no producia viento ni nada iva muy lento como a paso de hombre lo observe durante unos 5 minutos hasta que se perdio en la noche ,
content.summary: Objeto de forma esferica de tamaño mediano como metal liquido gris opaco como aluminio

content.detailedDescription:
Our two friends and my girlfriend and i were at east point lighthouse in heislerville, nj between 8:30 pm and 10:30 pm on september 17th, 2015. the sky was extremely clear with plenty of airplanes and stars out to compare to. i'm positive that these sightings were neither. each sighting was in the sky over dover, delaware in the wsw and wnw directions, respectively.

#1 - a fat red spot in the sky appeared near the moon, visually approximately the size of a pencil eraser held out at arms length. when i first noticed it it was underneath the moon, relative to my viewing angle, in the sky. it hovered for about 10-15 seconds before darting quickly to the left and upward and stopped still resting to the left of the moon - again, from my viewing angle. the object hovered again momentarily before it darted upward and to the right toward the moon. the full motion was like a clockwise half moon. the object disappeared from the sky as it crossed the tip of the top of the moon. i want to be clear that i don't believe it physically went to the moon, rather it was just the closest object in the sky i can use as a point of reference.

#2 - this sighting went on for at least 30 minutes. a smaller dot in the sky the size of an average star hovering and then darting and then hovering again. this object was doing very clear patterns. first squares. then triangles. then squiggly zig-zag motions up and down, left and right. this object performed very quick, sharp, angular motions. every motion would be followed by absolute still hovering for 2-5 seconds. the object was slowly working its way toward the south, but never stopped doing patterned motions as long as we tracked it. always hovering before each new movement in the pattern. the distance it would cover in the sky in each movement would be roughly an inch to two inches at a time if a ruler were held out at arms length and each destination would be reached in the same amount of time with the same amount of speed, regardless of how far it went each time.

we were absolutely going nuts trying to figure out what these objects could be. the red one was perplexing but the star-like one put on quite a show - and was still going as we left. there were so many other aircraft in the sky almost directly above us to compare these to and none of them even came close to what we were watching. the distance that these objects appeared at and the swiftness of their motions is what is most baffling to us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large red orb circling the moon in burst motions - star-like object hovering and doing patterns.
